content: TE 2000-AVR TE-S electric jackhammer Powerful and extremely light TE-S breaker for concrete and demolition work ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Demolition hammers and breakers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Very low tool weight combined with high demolition performance for dedicated floor breaking T-design for perfect handling in floor-breaking applications Maintenance-free brushless SR motor and triple-chamber lubrication systems for longer service intervals and tool lifetime Active Vibration Reduction (AVR) makes the tool less tiring to use – helping to increase daily productivity Detachable supply cord for quick and easy replacement of damaged/broken cords on the jobsite Applications Medium-duty demolition of concrete slabs and foundations Removing concrete for rebar connections and utility connections Breaking work on concrete or other materials in basements and on patios in residential applications Breaking out channels for laying pipe in plumbing applications ### TECHNICAL DATA:Working direction: FloorTool chuck type: TE-SWeight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 32 lb. Technical Data | Working direction | Floor | Tool chuck type | TE-S | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 32 lb | Single impact energy | 25.8 ft-lbs | Full hammering frequency | 1800 impacts/minute | Max. chiseling performance | 866 in³/min | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 28.8 x 22.6 x 5.7 in | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 3.9 m/s² | 1 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-B | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 88 dB (A) | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3578530 - TE 2000-AVR trolley performance package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 2000-AVR 120V Breaker detach - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 2x Pointed chisel TE-SX SM 43 - 2x Flat chisel TE-SX FM 43 - 1x Trolley TE 2000-AVR - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 3856313 - TE 2000-AVR Performance Pkg Flat - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 2000-AVR 120V Breaker detach - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 4x Flat chisel TE-SX FM 43 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 3856314 - TE 2000-AVR Performance Pkg Point - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 2000-AVR 120V Breaker detach - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 4x Pointed chisel TE-SX SM 43 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 3856315 - TE 2000-AVR Performance Pkg Scaling - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 2000-AVR 120V Breaker detach - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 4x Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 43/8 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 2149471 - Breaker TE 2000-AVR 120V - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 2000-AVR 120V Breaker detach - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml
